translations: n.（Lea）人名；（西、意、罗、匈、挪、德、芬）莱亚；（英）利

phrs.translation: 安全护栏, 应用外语, 地方教育局, 蛋白

sentences.sentence: Father Stephen Lea administered the last rites to the dying men.
sentences.translation: 史蒂芬·利神父为死者主持了临终圣礼。

sentences.sentence: China has three main types of teas: green tea, black lea and wulong tea, a halfway between black and green tea.
sentences.translation: 中国有三种主要的茶：绿茶、红茶和乌龙茶，乌龙茶是一种介于红茶和绿茶之间的茶。

sentences.sentence: His first partnership was with Paul and Phyllis Amburgh, owners of the Dharma Lea farm in New York.
sentences.translation: 他的第一个合作伙伴是保罗·阿姆伯格和菲利斯·阿姆伯格，他们是纽约达摩·李农场的所有者。
